00048 /*===========================================================================
00049  *      File :          l_histogram.h
00050  *      Description :   Histogram data structure and related functs
00051  *      Creation Date : June 1994
00052  *      Author :        Scott Mahlke
00053  *
00054  *==========================================================================*/
00055 #ifndef L_HISTOGRAM_H
00056 #define L_HISTOGRAM_H
00057 
00058 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00059 #include <config.h>
00060 #include <stdio.h>
00061 #include <malloc.h>
00062 
00063 
00064 #define L_DEFAULT_HISTOGRAM_SIZE        1024
00065 #define L_MAX_HISTOGRAM_SIZE            L_DEFAULT_HISTOGRAM_SIZE*256
00066 
00067 typedef struct L_Histogram
00068 {
00069   char *name;
00070   double *data;
00071   int size;
00072   double over_max_data;
00073 }
00074 L_Histogram;
00075 
00076 
00077 /* print modes */
00078 #define L_PRINT_ALL_ENTRIES             1
00079 #define L_PRINT_GROUPED_VALUES          2
00080 #define L_PRINT_GROUPED_PERCENTAGES     3
00081 #define L_PRINT_INDIVIDUAL_PERCENTAGES  4
00082 #define L_PRINT_AVERAGE_VALUE           5
00083

00085 extern "C"
00086 {
00087 #endif
00088 
00089   extern L_Histogram *L_create_histogram (char *, int);
00090   extern void L_delete_histogram (L_Histogram *);
00091   extern void L_realloc_histogram_data (L_Histogram *, int);
00092   extern void L_update_histogram (L_Histogram *, int, double);
00093   extern void L_clear_histogram (L_Histogram *);
00094   extern void L_scale_histogram_entries (L_Histogram *, double);
00095   extern void L_copy_histogram (L_Histogram *, L_Histogram *);
00096   extern void L_add_histograms (L_Histogram *, L_Histogram *, L_Histogram *);
00097   extern void L_print_histogram (FILE *, L_Histogram *, int, double);
00098 
00099 #ifdef __cplusplus
00100 }
